attributes.title: this app is so ✨h o r r i b l e✨
attributes.review: so basically i was downloading this app and when i opened it i saw a cheeto puff in the white house and i was shocked and it was so disgusting so eventually i was on my bathroom floor vomiting into my toilet and now i have to go to the hospital because i was vomiting blood and i have internal bleeding. NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP

This app is bad and it’s just a waste of time to download 🙄 it also crashed a lot and take like 20 hours to load. When it did finally open, I got scared bc there was a orange ogre  looking thing on there 😭honestly just don’t download it 🙄🙄🦍🦍🦍🦍🦍🦍🕴🕴🕴🍊

attributes.title: I really wanted to like it.
attributes.review: I am a fan of trump, but this app is too confusing!! I can’t understand how to work it and I’m usually tech savvy. This is a real disappointment and deleting it should be heavily considered. It shut down on me 6 times, not acceptable.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE MONSTER
attributes.review: I can to see what trumps new plans were but when I got on the app I was terrified because I saw a orange looking Cheeto looking back at me. I have nightmares for nights and I had to go to the hospital because the Cheeto man gave me a numerous amount of diseases from just looking at him 😖

attributes.title: Not very good
attributes.review: As a fellow council member of the BBE (big booty enterprise), it has come to our attention that our president has actually, in fact, been selling personal data on this application by means of obtaining a bigger booty. It is our duty to maintain booty balance throughout the world. Justice must be served.

attributes.title: this app ruined my life
attributes.review: when i got this app my girlfriend broke up with me, my dog died, i got kicked out of college, my parents kicked me out, i was homeless, my phone completely broke, i crashed my car, i lost my job, i almost died, all my friends stopped being my friends, and my information was taken by the government and used in a secret experiment!!!!! it is all this apps fault, it ruins people’s lives with its lies!!! stay away from this app or you’ll end up like me!!

attributes.title: 🥰✨horrible ✨🥰
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible, i was going to support our 🍊president and everything when i saw the app was glitching 😔 I had to talk to my therapist about this🤭 and i do not! recommend getting this app👀 it will hurt your brain and scar you for life 👁👄👁

attributes.title: virus infested app
attributes.review: I am not tech savvy but I think this app gave my iPad a virus... immediately after downloading I got lots of spam photos of a Cheeto! It scared my children who also used the iPad 😣 Got so bad that I can’t even open up my iPad to write this review. Don’t get it.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible and full of misinformation. You would thing a man with as much money as trump would be able to make a good and reliable app but it is incredibly disappointing that this app is as bad as everyone says.

attributes.title: don’t get it
attributes.review: i don’t think u should get this app at all. When i went on this app it felt like a bunch of racism goin around and i don’t understand why that needs to happen! why can’t it be like any other app? this app truly scares me.
